code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./NotesGrid.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NotesGrid(){const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const courses=['CSC 423: Software Egineering','CSC 311: Theory of Computation','CSC 313: Data Structures','MAT 213: Calculus III','CSC 325: Analysis of Algorithms','CSC 432: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence'];const filteredCourses=courses.filter(course=>course.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-grid-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"search-bar",placeholder:"Search for a course...",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:filteredCourses.map((course,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid-item",children:course},index))})]});}export default NotesGrid;
